name: Knights With Guns (Spadille)
description:
This is a game I made for my Networking module in university.

You and a friend control two small knights in a fighting arena. You need to quickly find a gun and shoot the other player to win the round. The game consists of three different stages and you can set the number of rounds at the start of the game. The person with the most points at the end of the rounds wins.

Assets:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
